title: PythonCheatSheet ---HTML and 10-page two-column PDF
author: t2_1pko65xw
text:
I've made a [reference sheet](https://github.com/alhassy/PythonCheatSheet) of some Python, from iterables to decorators and the walrus operator \^\_\^

\- [here's a 10-page 2-column PDF](https://alhassy.github.io/PythonCheatSheet/CheatSheet.pdf)   
\- [single-column portrait PDF](https://alhassy.github.io/PythonCheatSheet/CheatSheet_Portrait.pdf)   
Enjoy!

comments.author: paradigmx
comments.body: Wow, this is well put together. I will definitely use this. Thank you.

comments.author: SlappyWhite54
comments.body: Things like this are always appreciated!!! Thanks for posting!

comments.body: Thank you i would give you gold if i had money  🥰
